title: Nadia Sawalha looks happy with kids despite bitter family feud with sister
text:
The Sawalha family attended the Knives Out premiere (Picture: Lia Toby/Getty Images for BFI)

Nadia Sawalha was in high spirits attending the Knives Out premiere with her family while she blocked out the furious rows with her sister.

The 54-year-old had no time to think about her estranged sister while she hung out with her husband Mark Adderley and two children Maddie, 16, and Kiki-Bee, 12, on the red carpet last night.

Her sister was nowhere in sight after claiming Nadia had ‘destroyed’ their family.

The Loose Women panellist looked like she couldn’t care less about the claims as she has all the family she needs.

Knives Out premiered on Tuesday night (Picture: David Fisher/REX)

Julia Sawalha is best known for her role in Absolutely Fabulous (Picture: Richard Young/REX/Shutterstock)

Their outing comes several weeks after the former EastEnders star’s fallout with her actress sister Julie was brought to light.

Advertisement

The Absolutely Fabulous star Julia had said that Nadia had been spouting ‘lies and rubbish’ for attention on television in order to get ‘sympathy and attention’ from the public.

She tweeted: ‘So tired of #nadiasawalha talking about our’stormy’ relationship which she created.

‘I’ve kept my privacy for 6 years to protect my family, whilst she talks lies& rubbish. You have destroyed our family so don’t sit on TV with your fake tears to gain sympathy & attention. [sic]’

The star also went on and liked a few tweets from Loose Women viewers who weighed in on the feud.

She paired the look with sweatpants (Picture: Anthony Harvey/REX)

One tweet said: ‘Leave her [Nadia] to be bitter on TV and carry on with your life behind the scenes, knowing what the truth is!’

Yikes.

Nadia had recently mentioned that her and her younger sibling have a ‘really volatile relationship’ and go through phases where the two don’t speak.

Guess they’re still in that ‘no speaking’ phase.
